level.text: 607.1 At the time of the acceptance of the motor vehicle for parking in or upon licensed premise, the licensee shall supply a claim check or receipt to theerson leaving the vehicle for storage.
607.2 Each claim check or receipt shall be distinctly numbered to correspondith a coupon that shall be placed upon the motor vehicle during the time theehicle is stored.
607.3 Each claim check shall show on its face the following:
The personal or business name of the licensee; and
The street address of the premise where the vehicle is stored; or
A claim number the licensee can rely upon to determine the location wherehe vehicle is stored.

607.4 On premises not having motor vehicle servicing facilities, or that useverflow premises for storage, a notice or sign shall be placed in a conspicuousocation notifying the public of the fact that vehicles are stored off-premises.
607.5 No vehicle shall be parked or caused to be parked so that it or any partf it is on or projects over public space, except as provided in Chapter 2 ofhis Title.
